text: We're open sourcing v2 of our Perplexity clone in 24 hours Ask any question and get AI-powered answers with images and cited sources, all powered by /v2 our search and scrape endpoints. Powered by @firecrawl_dev and @aisdk

author: Qoder

text: Juicy startup idea: Your toilet breaks at 2am. Who do you call? The property manager isn’t picking up. You need an AI voice agent. Workflow: Tenant calls → AI answers → classifies the problem → repair dispatched → texts the plumber’s ETA → Problem solved Property
author: The Startup Ideas Podcast (SIP)

text: My janky nano-banana --> Veo 3 workflow for longer videos: Take the last frame of your first clip, bring to nano-banana on @lmarena_ai, and prompt the next scene - e.g. "character turns down hallway." Then take the new frame back to animate. Will be if they integrate...
author: Justine Moore

text: In March, we launched Paper Finder, an LLM-powered literature search agent that surfaces papers other tools miss. Now, we’re releasing an open-source snapshot to enable others to inspect & build on it—and reproduce the results.

text: coming very soon to bitchat: location chat. chat with anyone in nearby regions (block/neighborhood/city/region/country). or teleport to anywhere in the world via a geohash. it works by using geohashes to map the world into chat channels, uses a new pseudonym per geohash for
author: jack

text: TikTok farming lesson #1 (updated) We’ve set up 50+ accounts by now, and f*cked up multiple times to figure out that getting the phone + tiktok account setup wrong will nuke your farm before it even starts. I learned this the hard way after accounts kept getting flagged.
